column5: Went to a local pond with Pat (fishtank), all he used was a massive buzz bait. In 4hrs, I caught 3 small bass, he caught 23 raging from 1lb to 4.8lb(4lbs 5oz). I think this guy will out do any pro I know. For fishing with Pat again, I will have to say yes, he taught me that if is you don't have a horse shoe up your A**, you won't be a productive fisherperson. Just my rant.  Thanx, Daniel OCH

He taught you that you have to have hourseshoe up your ... to catch fish. WOW that is great info  . Not to be rude but, I think we all know that you need a little luck on your side to catch fish, and also the proper baits to be used in certain conditions, time of year ect........ Just my rant.
l will take a horse shoe. PLEASE. OH PLEASE, USE A SMALL HORSE!!!!!! LOL. Peace Ken
Well that explains a lot. I don't bring my horseshoe with me fishing!
I'm going to buy a horse shoe like fishtank's, he's a true ball breaker and bass buster. Fishtank where are you, did that 40# Goby get you. LOL
Hey I can't say I have horse shoes. But ontariocarper is right. I"ve had some crazy luck this year.  But trust me there no horse shoes any where.
hahahahahaha... lol.. I know a guy like that too...
What a load of crap. Fishing is all about decent gear, luck and common sense.

Hey gonefishing. these were just for a laugh. what ontariocarper is saying is that yes you do need lady luck by your side sometimes and yes good gear and know how . But maybe I don't have horse shoes maybe I have a 4 leaf clover, hey maybe even a a rabbits foot. What ever it is lady luck is on my side this year.  Keep fishing! "fish tank"
I too have a horseshoe, my son. He is always out fishing me.
My question are........  1) after it was very clear that fishtank was outfishing you by 7 to1 did you switch to a buzz bait too? 2) how massive is massive?   stuntman
